Terms of Service

Terms of Service

By using this app, you agree to allow us to schedule and publish content to your connected social media accounts. You retain full ownership of your content. We are not responsible for platform restrictions or takedowns.

  • You maintain full ownership of all content
  • We only access accounts you explicitly connect
  • Service is provided "as-is" without guarantees
ğŸ”’

Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy

We only access the data required to connect your social media accounts and publish content on your behalf. We do not sell or share your data. You may disconnect your account at any time.

  • Social media account information for posting
  • Video files you choose to upload or process
  • Settings and preferences you configure
  • API tokens (stored securely, never shared)
